title: Burt Dow, deep-water man
creator_credit: Kratky Film, Weston Woods Studios, Zdenka Deitchova, Morton Schindel and Vaclav Bedrich
brief_description: An animated film of adventure in the high seas. When Burt Dow, a retired seaman, sets sail in his boat the Tidley-Idley to fish for cod, he ends up inside a whale. The whale refuses to let Burt leave, so Burt dreams up a uniquely artistic solution. Based on the book by Robert McCloskey. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
